text: Auchenshoogle is a fictional Scottish town, an amalgam of Dundee and Glasgow, the setting (originally unnamed) of the comic strips Oor Wullie and The Broons in The Sunday Post. The name was used infrequently in the early days of the comic strip, coming into more frequent use in the late 1990s. ==See also== * Auchenshuggle * Auchterturra * Brigadoon ==References== *Scottish Castles Association Newsletter, Issue 2 Category:Fictional populated places in Scotland Category:DC Thomson Comics populated places
title: Auchenshoogle
